articles.title: Soccer writer Grant Wahl died of heart aneurysm at World Cup - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Grant Wahl died of an aneurysm in his heart when he was stricken while covering a World Cup match last weekend, according to an autopsy of the well-known American soccer writer.
